content: pin striped socks by julia swart these socks are inspired by my desire to make striped stockinette socks just a little more fancy without losing the fun colorful effect that self-striping socks have i have included directions to make the afterthought heel i am most comfortable with but you are welcome to use any afterthought heel you like materials self-striping sock yarn at least 350 yards total mine were done in friday studios self-striping sock yarn in the sweden colorway set of four us 2 2 75mm double pointed or circular needles the pattern is written for dpn s tapestry needle stitch marker if desired gauge 32sts x 4 in/10 cm r ow gauge is not needed as length is variable sticksandstonespodcast wordpress com weesheepknits com abbreviations co- cast on k- knit p- purl k2tog- knit two stitches together sl slip_stitch purlwise ssk- slip two stitches knitwise and knit together sts- stitches dpn- double pointed needles leg co 64 sts using long tail cast on join for working in the round evenly spacing sts across 3 dpn s 32 sts on n1 16 sts on n2 and n3 and placing st marker at the end of the row if desired work in k2 p2 rib for 1 inch on next round knit all sts slip_stitch pattern round 1 sl 1 k7 around round 2 knit around to seamlessly integrate heel add waste yarn half-way through a stripe waste yarn is added over n2 and n3 by knitting across with a contrasting color yarn return to the beginning of n2 back of leg and knit across with striping yarn from this point on the slip stitch pattern sts will repeat only on n1 n2/n3 will be knit in stockinette st for the bottom of the foot continue repeating slip_stitch pattern until the length from waste yarn to live sts is 2 inches less than desired length of foot measuring from ankle bone to toe toe n1 k1 k2tog k across to last 3 sts ssk k1 n2 k1 k2tog k across n3 k to last 3 sts ssk k1 next round k all sts repeat these two rounds until you have 12 sts on n1 and 6 sts on n2 and n3 each move n3 sts onto n2 cut a long tail and graft toe using kitchener stitch weave ends heel afterthought heel- please refer sticks and stones podcast- episode 20 for more details www sticksandstonespodcast wordpress com remove waste yarn and pick up live std onto three needles 32 sts on n1 16 sts on n2 and n3 each you will be basically repeating the toe decrease instructions n1 k1 k2tog k across to last 3 sts ssk k1 n2 k1 k2tog k across n3 k to last 3 sts ssk k1 next round k all sts repeat these two rounds until you have 12 std on n1 and 6 std on n2 and n3 each move n3 sts onto n2 cut a long tail and graft toe using kitchener
